document.full_text: the mayor of mexico city, a quake-prone metropolis of 20 million people, said on friday he is planning a warning system that will send alerts directly to mobile phones seconds before an earthquake strikes.
document.title: mexico mayor eyes new mobile quake alert this year
lines_and_colors: the mayor of mexico city, a quake-prone metropolis of 20 million people, said on friday he is planning a warning system that will send alerts directly to mobile phones seconds before an earthquake strikes.
